name: Ridiculous-answers
tagline: A simple web app that gives you ridiculous answers to your questions.
body:
<html>
<head>
<script src='https://code.responsivevoice.org/responsivevoice.js'></script>
<script>
function shuffle(array) {
  var currentIndex = array.length, temporaryValue, randomIndex;
  // While there remain elements to shuffle...
  while (0 !== currentIndex) {
    // Pick a remaining element...
    randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * currentIndex);
    currentIndex -= 1;
    // And swap it with the current element.
    temporaryValue = array[currentIndex];
    array[currentIndex] = array[randomIndex];
    array[randomIndex] = temporaryValue;
  }
  return array;
}
var arr = ["Bake more cookies!", "Eat more bacon!", "Download malware!", "Blow it up!"];
shuffle(arr);
</script>
</head>
<body>
<input type="text"/>
<input onclick='responsiveVoice.speak(arr[0]);' type='button' value='ðŸ”Š Get Answer' />
</body>
</html>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
